name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Attacks one enemy and lowers it's \c[5]defense\c[0].
name: Ether Thrust
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
move user: targets, front, 10
wait for movement
move user: FORWARD, -100, 15
jump user: 75%, 15
MOTION ESCAPE: user
wait: 30
camera clamp on
camera focus: user
MOTION THRUST: user
move user: FORWARD, 300, 10
animation 18: target
motion ATTACK: user
attack animation: target
flash screen: Red, 10
action effect
wait: 10
</target action>

description: Applies stat buffs to a single ally.
name: Blessing

description: Applies stat buffs to all allies.
name: Blessing II
note: <Cooldown: 5>

description: Applies major stat buffs to a single ally.
name: Blessing III
note: <Cooldown: 6>

description: Cures poison and other ailments to a single ally.
name: Recovery

description: Removes Debuffs to a single ally.
name: Recovery II
note: <Cooldown: 5>

description: Removes all debuffs and ailments to all allies at varied rates.
name: Recovery III
note: <Cooldown: 6>

description: Brings back a fallen ally.

description: Brings all fallen allies.

note: <Cooldown: 5>
